transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ActualPlanned as string,
		CanculatedDate as string,
		Percentage as integer,
		Rank as string,
		Requirement as (RequirementType as string, Matrics as (MatrixStatus as string, MatrixType as string, MatrixRemarks as string, MatrixName as string, Documents as (DocumentStatus as string, DocumentExpiryDate as string, DocumentType as string, DocumentNumber as string, DocumentValidityMonth as integer, DocumentIssueDate as string, DocumentRemarks as string)[])[])[],
		Vessel as string,
		VesselFlag as string,
		crewId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 20,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'document',
	throughput: 1000) ~> source1
source1 filter(equalsIgnoreCase(byName('ActualPlanned'), 'Planned')) ~> FilterActualPlanned
FlattenRequirement filter(equalsIgnoreCase(byName('RequirementType'), 'Mandatory Requirements')) ~> FilterMandatoryRequirement
MapDrifted1 foldDown(unroll(Requirement, Requirement),
	mapColumn(
		RequirementType = Requirement.RequirementType,
		Matrics = Requirement.Matrics,
		Percentage,
		Rank,
		CanculatedDate,
		crewId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenRequirement
FilterMandatoryRequirement foldDown(unroll(Matrics, Matrics),
	mapColumn(
		RequirementType,
		Percentage,
		Rank,
		CalculatedDate = CanculatedDate,
		crewId,
		Matrics
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenMatrixs
FlattenMatrixs filter(equalsIgnoreCase(Matrics.MatrixName, 'SBM Operations Readiness CORE - Region 1')) ~> FilterMatrixName
FilterDocumentType derive(crewId = toString(crewId)) ~> DerivedColumn1
FilterMatrixName foldDown(unroll(Matrics.Documents, Matrics.Documents),
	mapColumn(
		RequirementType,
		Percentage,
		Rank,
		CalculatedDate,
		crewId,
		Documents = Matrics.Documents,
		MatrixStatus = Matrics.MatrixStatus,
		MatrixRemarks = Matrics.MatrixRemarks,
		MatrixName = Matrics.MatrixName,
		MatrixType = Matrics.MatrixType
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> FlattenDocuments
FlattenDocuments filter(equalsIgnoreCase(trim(Documents.DocumentType), 'Environmental Awareness ISO 14001')) ~> FilterDocumentType
FilterActualPlanned derive(crewId = toString(byName('crewId'))) ~> MapDrifted1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		DocumentExpiryDate as string,
		DocumentIssueDate as string,
		DocumentNumber as string,
		DocumentRemarks as string,
		DocumentStatus as string,
		DocumentType as string,
		DocumentValidityMonth as string,
		MatrixName as string,
		MatrixRemarks as string,
		MatrixStatus as string,
		MatrixType as string,
		userId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/id'],
	throughput: 500,
	mapColumn(
		Percentage,
		Rank,
		crewId,
		MatricsStatus = MatrixStatus,
		MatrixType,
		MatrixRemarks,
		MatrixName,
		Documents,
		CalculatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		Active_Flag as boolean,
		Application_Date as string,
		Available_From_Date as string,
		Cpf_Flag as boolean,
		Cpf_Number as string,
		Crew_Alergies as string,
		Crew_Birth_Country as string,
		Crew_Birth_Date as string,
		Crew_Blood_Rh as string,
		Crew_Blood_Type as string,
		Crew_Boiler_Suit_Size as string,
		Crew_Born_Place as string,
		Crew_Change_Password as string,
		Crew_Cis_Idno as integer,
		Crew_Code as short,
		Crew_Color_Blindness as string,
		Crew_Comp_Date as string,
		Crew_Dis_Marks as string,
		Crew_Employment_Year as string,
		Crew_Eye_Sight as string,
		Crew_Eyes as string,
		Crew_Father_Middle_Name as string,
		Crew_Father_Surname as string,
		Crew_Fathers_Name as string,
		Crew_Group_Date as string,
		Crew_Hair as string,
		Crew_Height as string,
		Crew_Hrdf as string,
		Crew_ID as string,
		Crew_Indos_No as string,
		Crew_Isn_Employment_No as string,
		Crew_Marriage_Date as string,
		Crew_Medical_Insurance_Scheme as string,
		Crew_Medication as string,
		Crew_Middlename as string,
		Crew_Mother_Maiden_Name as string,
		Crew_Mother_Middle_Name as string,
		Crew_Mother_Surname as string,
		Crew_Mothers_Name as string,
		Crew_Name as string,
		Crew_Name2 as string,
		Crew_Nationality as string,
		Crew_Nationality2 as string,
		Crew_Nationality_Date as string,
		Crew_Nickname as string,
		Crew_Nor_Idno as string,
		Crew_Orig_Born_Place as string,
		Crew_Orig_Middlename as string,
		Crew_Orig_Name as string,
		Crew_Orig_Surname as string,
		Crew_Pagibig_No as string,
		Crew_Phealth_No as string,
		Crew_Pool as string,
		Crew_Principal as integer,
		Crew_Race as string,
		Crew_Rank as string,
		Crew_Rank_Certificate as string,
		Crew_Rank_Certificate_Date as string,
		Crew_Rank_Point as string,
		Crew_Religion as string,
		Crew_Sb_Country as string,
		Crew_Sex as string,
		Crew_Shipnet as string,
		Crew_Shoe_Size as string,
		Crew_Socso as string,
		Crew_Srcno as string,
		Crew_Ssn as string,
		Crew_Sss_No as string,
		Crew_Status_Code as string,
		Crew_Surname as string,
		Crew_Tax_Regime as string,
		Crew_Tin as string,
		Crew_Type as string,
		Crew_Weight as string,
		Crew_password as string,
		Crews_Rank_Point_Date as string,
		Date_Last_Med as string,
		Decision_Code as string,
		Dualog_Status as string,
		Employment_End_Date as string,
		English_Test as string,
		Est_Sign_On as string,
		Extended_Leave as string,
		Health_Status as string,
		Last_Edited_Date as string,
		Last_Sign_Off_Date as string,
		Lc_Id as string,
		Lv_Id as string,
		Manning_Office as string,
		Manual_Update as string,
		Martial_Status as short,
		Next_Vessel as integer,
		Ob_Stat as string,
		Office_Vessel_Flag as string,
		On_Vessel as string,
		Passport_Country as string,
		Passport_Details as string,
		Passport_Expiry_Date as string,
		Passport_Issue_Place as string,
		Passport_Issued_Date as string,
		Passport_Number as string,
		Pension_Flag as string,
		Port_Authority as string,
		Port_Authority2 as string,
		Pr_Status as string,
		Prev_Exp_As as string,
		Prior_Exp_Months as string,
		Prior_Exp_Voyages as string,
		Promotion as string,
		Promotion_Date as string,
		Promotion_Rank as string,
		Rank_Seniority as string,
		Remarks1 as string,
		Remarks2 as string,
		SeamanBook_Expiry as string,
		SeamanBook_Issued as string,
		SeamanBook_Number as string,
		SeamanBook_Place as string,
		Seniority as integer,
		Sign_On_Remarks as string,
		Sign_On_Remarks2 as string,
		Sign_On_Remarks3 as string,
		Source_Code as short,
		Status_Code as string,
		Vessel_Name as string,
		Wage_Matrix as string,
		Wage_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: false,
	throughput: 1000) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		id = Crew_Code,
		surname = Crew_Surname,
		name = Crew_Name,
		rank = Crew_Rank,
		SBMer = Crew_Type,
		vesselName = Vessel_Name,
		pool = Crew_Pool
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Select derive(SBMer = !equalsIgnoreCase(byName('SBMer'), "VENDOR") ||  isNull(byName('SBMer')),
		region = iif(contains(['FPSO Cidade de Saquarema', 'FPSO Cidade de Maricá', 'FPSO Cidade de Ilhabela', 'FPSO Cidade de Paraty', 'FPSO CIdade de Anchieta', 'FPSO Espírito Santo', 'FPSO Capixaba'], #item == byName('vesselName')), "1", "2")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow() ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		name as string,
		surname as string,
		pool as string,
		rank as string,
		offshore as boolean,
		SBMer as boolean,
		vesselName as string,
		region as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/id'],
	throughput: 500,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
